name: Monster Fight (PENBEK)
description:
A 2d action game where you play as a monster who needs to survive as long as possible. You support yourself with human-made chargers and kill humans. The more energy you have more often you can shoot. If you have less energy you deal more damage with a single shot. All artwork is made by Pency, all the programming by Bek, music is not made by us.

Hi, our next Update will be about some Post-processing!

You already can see it in the screenshots.
